name: elogio
description: Collect image sources into Elog.io while browsing (demo)
author: Commons Machinery (http://commonsmachinery.se/) [dev@commonsmachinery.se]

preferences.name: catalogEndpoint
preferences.title: Catalog endpoint URL
preferences.description: The URL to the REST API of your preferred catalog.

preferences.name: standardSiteRulesURL
preferences.title: Standard site rules
preferences.description: If non-blank, the add-on will load standard rules from this URL to instruct it on how to find metadata on sites which don't support full auto discovery.

preferences.name: localSiteRulesFile
preferences.title: Local site rules
preferences.description: If provided, load local rules from this file. These will override any standard rules.

preferences.name: fetchSiteRules
preferences.title: Update standard and local rules
preferences.label: Update
preferences.description: Update the site-specific rules by fetching the URL specified above and loading any local file.

preferences.name: showCopyMetadata
preferences.title: Enable metadata menu items
preferences.description: Add context menu items to copy all metadata for an image or a page to the clipboard as regular text (useful for e.g. debugging).
